description:
In this course ,there are 17 lectures out of which the first one defines and explains what meditation is.

Where as Six lectures deal with the techniques of meditation such as the balancing of the body and mind ,focusing for attention,observation of breathing,Emotions and stories ,the silence in meditation and the duration of meditation.

In the next ten lectures the benefits of meditation are explained such as the gaining of inner peace,curing insomnia , increasing the self awareness, making your presence,increasing your consciousness,increasing your spiritual connection and it becomes source of inspiration and how it rejuvenates you and increases your fulfillment of life.

Overall it is really a wonderful course on meditation which helps the learner to practice it and get happiness.
title: Meditation:The Road To Happiness
